'''Dina Diggle''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Dina was married to [[Gundahar Bolger]]. They had two children, [[Adalgar Bolger|Adalgar]] ({{SR|1215}}-{{SR|1314}}) and [[Adaldrida Brandybuck|Adaldrida]] (born {{SR|1218}}).<ref>{{App|Bolger}}</ref>
